class.name: Plan
class.description: The [Plan] provides methods for declaring actions, goals, [Multigoal], and tasks, as well as finding and executing plans to achieve those goals in a [Domain].

method.name: find_plan
method.description: Finds a [Plan] to achieve the goals in the todo list from the given state.

method.name: run_lazy_lookahead
method.description: Runs a lazy lookahead search to find a [Plan], trying up to max_tries times.

members.member: The current [Domain] in which the [Plan] operates.
The verbosity level of the [Plan]'s output.
Adds a verification of the state if the goals are met.
